author: Caitlin Huston
title: Apple unveils new Apple TV with Siri capable remote
text: Apple Inc. AAPL, -0.13% announced a new Apple TV Wednesday with a Siri capable and glass-touch remote, allowing the user to choose a TV show by speaking. With the Siri capabilities, the TV will search through apps such as Netflix NFLX, +6.12% Showtime CBS, +0.02% Hulu and HBO TWX, -1.00% for the show the user is looking for and give information on screen such as game scores or weather. The glass-touch remote allows the user to swipe, rather than push the buttons. Apple redesigned its apps, introduced a new developing app platform called TV OS apps and brought Apple music to the TV. "We believe the future of television is apps," CEO TIm Cook said. Read more on the live blog .
